__e: I'm sorry I'll do anything Forgive me, please.
It's a part of you, which, forgive me please, I do not want to have anything to do with.
God, please. God, please. Please, forgive me.
I'm sorry I'll do anything Forgive me, please.
It's a part of you, which, forgive me please, I do not want to have anything to do with.
God, please. God, please. Please, forgive me.
So excuse me for not telling you that your girlfriend was pregnant.
Forgive me for not coming before.
I'm sorry I didn't tell you the truth about me.
You're obviously a smart man, so forgive me when I say you're missing the point.
Please forgive me for asking for help, but I do need help, so please give it to me if you feel able, and let me sing in a way that will please him and you, of course, too.
People take it... Forgive me for saying so.
I'm sorry I didn't tell you the truth about me.
Please forgive me for asking for help, but I do need help, so please give it to me if you feel able, and let me sing in a way that will please him and you, of course, too.
Forgive me for wanton' to tell the world that I found the most perfect girl, and I wanna spend the rest of my life with her.
Forgive me, Father... for I have indeed sinned.
Forgive me, father, for I have sinned so many times, and that's just today.
Forgive me, Father... for I know not what I do.
Forgive me, Father, but whatever you say, in your own heart, you know that is a lie!
Forgive me, Father... for I know not what I do.
Forgive me, father, for I have sinned so many times, and that's just today.
Please forgive me for what I said.
I know I shouldn't have done it... but please, please forgive me for- for what I didn't do.
Please, God, forgive me for what I'm about to do.
I know I shouldn't have done it... but please, please forgive me for- for what I didn't do.
Forgive me for the things I've done, and for the things I've yet to do.
O Lord, forgive me, I'm not doing it for myself.
Oh, I'm sorry, wasn't it you who, just two days ago, told my boss you wanted a piece of the action?
Forgive me. I am not sure, that helps me.
Forgive me, but I can't even tell you, and you're my best friend.
Forgive me but I don't really trust you, except on unfamiliar territory.
I'm sorry, but I think this is my house.
Forgive me, but I can't even tell you, and you're my best friend.
Forgive me but I don't really trust you, except on unfamiliar territory.
